name: Project kiss kiss Version 1.0 Demo
description: Project kiss kiss is a personal project im working on. i always wanted to build a game and since ive been on a doki doki high along with a lot of other visual novels ive decided to try building my own its not really good personally but i wanna keep trying at it feel free to download it or dont. the game is not long and its in the build phase so dont expect everything being good... its not
